body: There arethings ypu can't just fap to, but the plot so grotesque yet compelling so you keep reading, only to regret it

hot, very hot
Damn, this is delicious! Finally some good fucking rape.

Fuck, why I like this kind of stuff ? I mean, I don't fapped to it (except for that one with the slutty class rep and the teacher, this one was hot), but I find these plots really entertaining. Maybe I'm really an fucked sadist.

The girl getting fucked in the ass by a bone is the only interesting part the rest is rushed garbage I love to see fucked up shit but when you skip around so much by the time I am like wow I'm kinda interested in this girl she is already dead like fuck keep them alive long enough to have a character
Hal is a girl?

For the first storyline, why the hell didn't the father not just send the video on live in media first, instead of confronting the boss?! The moment he got knocked out, I knew things are gonna get bad from there, oh and yeah, let's leave the girls by themselves after they got raped not expecting one of them to get so mentally traumatized to the point she would kill herself.
Hal deals with S&M In such a way as to make otherwise disgusting topics either comedic or fun. Without forgetting love. You can tell they care.

Not satisfied. The author draws emotions and faces pretty well, but fucks up anatomy of bodies hard, girls are twisting like worms. The plot lacks details, and is not that believable, dropped half way through. But I’ll surely take a look at other works of hal.
Wtf I've just read ,so cruel
Piece of art.

Its been a while since I read this, still as good as i remember. I'd probably find all this a lot more fucked up if I had been a faithful Oyster fan long before I realized I needed Hal in my life too. If you like Hal's work I'd suggest checking out Oyster's but be warned Oyster will take you to much darker places.
hal now my favorite artist, all of his works are 10/10 in my book
